items.sentence: I really do hope you've learned your lesson.

I wish we could've spent more time together.
I hope you're aware no one is above the law.
I hope you're aware nobody is above the law.

What do I have to do to make you believe me?

It's the first time this has happened to me.

I know that you can take care of yourselves.

I enjoy eating many different kinds of food.
